title:
I just read your 2009 article about former professor Larry Cable and wondered if you had done anything more recently about him. It was certainly a strange story about a strange guy in strange times. I am a Vietnam War historian and heard Cable speak in the late 80s and again in the early 90s. 



John M. Carland

Annandale, VA
text: Sorry, but we haven't written anything more recent about Larry Cable. Thanks for your interest.
